examples.title: Request-Example:
examples.content:
{
    "name": "肥皂",
    "description": "纯天然无污染肥皂",
    "details": "这是一块好肥皂",
    "imgUrl": "https://img.url",
    "price": 500,
    "stock": 10,
    "shopId": 12345
}

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 201 Created
{
  "data": {
         "id": 12345,
         "name": "肥皂",
         "description": "纯天然无污染肥皂",
         "details": "这是一块好肥皂",
         "imgUrl": "https://img.url",
         "price": 500,
         "stock": 10,
         "shopId": 12345,
         "createdAt": "2020-03-22T13:22:03Z",
         "updatedAt": "2020-03-22T13:22:03Z"
  }
}

Error 4xx.description: Bad Request 若用户的请求中包含错误
Forbidden 若用户尝试创建非自己管理店铺的商品

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 204 No Content
{
  "data": {
         "id": 12345,
         "name": "肥皂",
         "description": "纯天然无污染肥皂",
         "details": "这是一块好肥皂",
         "imgUrl": "https://img.url",
         "price": 500,
         "stock": 10,
         "createdAt": "2020-03-22T13:22:03Z",
         "updatedAt": "2020-03-22T13:22:03Z"
  }
}

Error 4xx.description: Bad Request 若用户的请求中包含错误
Forbidden 若用户尝试删除非自己管理店铺的商品

Parameter.description: 店铺ID，若传递，则只显示该店铺中的商品
